trends: There has been one other sighting in Honea Path
There were no other sightings in Honea Path on or around June 10th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsWent outsid e to smoke a cigarette.I just happend to look up at the sky from the back yard.I saw 2 objects I thought were aircraft at first.I thought one was a training craft and the other perhaps the instructor.Niether craft made a sound.I though that maybe one was a glider but then I asked myself-no engine sound? and they both look alike.Then they banked as they did so I could see that thay were round craft.I watched stuned as they flew of into the horizon.
